Package org.springframework.mock.web.portlet

Class MockPortletRequest

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.mock.web.portlet.MockPortletRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.portlet.PortletRequest, javax.portlet.RenderState
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockClientDataRequest, MockEventRequest, MockRenderRequest
public class MockPortletRequest extends Object implements javax.portlet.PortletRequest
Mock implementation of the PortletRequest interface.
Since:
2.0
Author:
John A. Lewis, Juergen Hoeller

      value - the value
